comments:
It seems to me that for unknown reason Eclipse repeats libraries in the 
classpath. I have many libraries to start with and after they get there several 
times, the end of the given command does not work any more which has critical 
information.
I have tested with 2.1.3 and 3.0M7 and I have the same problem.
I have tested with and without DevLoader.
I have tested with several Tomcats, but mainly with 4.1.30 and mainly with 
Jasper.
I use Struts and JDK 1.4.2_04.
I have checked that proper JDK with proper tools.jar.
If I compile manually with javac with libraries told it either succeeds or the 
DOS command limit is reached.

I would be happy to help, if someone wishes to look into this problem.

Error:

Perhaps JAVA_HOME does not point to the JDK

COuld this be a dup of bug 51533? (which has been fixed). We were incorrectly 
putting dupliucate entries on the classpath.

We also had bug 50144.
I would recommend trying build M8
On second testing works with 3.0M7 (still not with 2.x version).
